title: Megan Barton-Hanson wraps arms around new girlfriend Chelcee Grimes in cute PDA
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Megan Barton-Hanson was caught in a cute PDA with her new girlfriend Chelcee Grimes.

The Love Island star and Chelcee were pictured at the airport after flying back to London from Los Angeles.

Megan, who recently came out as bisexual and dated girls for the first time on Celebs Go Dating, has moved past her heartbreak after splitting with Demi Sims.

She showed off her natural beauty and a much more relaxed casual look as she hung out with Chelcee at the airport.

The 25-year-old wore cycling shorts and a baggy T-shirt, with her hair scraped back into a messy bun as she sat down for a cigarette after her long-haul flight.

(Image: MJ Pictures/GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: MJ-Pictures.com)

Chelcee was dressed casually for the long journey too, in light-coloured jeans and a checked green shirt on top of a black crop top.

Her hair was tied back and she wore a baseball cap.

The former stripper was seen cosying up to footballer and singer-songwriter Chelcee, 27, with the ladies wrapping their arms around each other and staring down at the same phone.

Megan looked happy to be in Chelcee's company and smiled as she looked towards her.

(Image: MJ Pictures/GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: MJ-Pictures.com)

Chelcee was also pictured holding onto Megan's shoulder as they looked into each other's eyes.

They were first linked not long after Megan's break-up with TOWIE star Demi.

And they confirmed their romance during a day out at Manchester's Etihad Stadium.

Megan was also recently featured in Chelcee's new music video for song Time To Talk, which saw them kissing and going on a date.

(Image: MJ-Pictures.com)

(Image: MJ Pictures/GoffPhotos.com)

The reality star took to social media to sing Chelcee's praises, saying: "SO proud to call this absolute babe my GIRLFRIEND."

Chelcee gushed: "Thank you for all your lovely messages about the Time To Talk video! And another thank you to @meganbartonhanson_ for being the perfect girl. This video is my most personal one yet."

Chelcee, who has penned hits for Kylie Minogue , Olly Murs and Dua Lipa , confirmed she was bisexual in a recent interview with Gay Times .

She said: "I say all the time it's about what's upstairs, not downstairs. If I can have a conversation with someone, and I'm getting along with them, and they're making me laugh, and I find them attractive - it's not about body parts, it's about the person. Definitely."

(Image: MJ-Pictures.com)

(Image: MJ-Pictures.com)

She also expressed concerns about misconceptions surrounding LGBT folk, especially as a footballer.

Chelcee explained: "I've got a lot of gay friends, and I always hear people say, 'Oh you don't look gay.' And especially because I play football a lot, people are like, 'Oh how many lesbians are on your team,' and it's just like, 'Ugh, why does it matter?'

"There's a lot of straight people, there's a lot of gay people, there's a lot of people in between. I just want us to get to a place where it's okay however anyone identifies, you know?

"So hopefully I can help or at least speak up on those issues when I get the chance to."

description: The Love Island star revealed her natural beauty as she went make-up free to travel home from Los Angeles
